amendment.description: Amendment increases and decreases by $10,000,000 funding to support programs providing outreach and support services targeting program participants at greatest risk of not completing a college degree.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 15 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to increase and decrease by $10,000,000 funding to support programs providing outreach and support services targeting program participants at greatest risk of not completing a college degree.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A015) Agreed to by recorded vote: 312 - 109 (Roll no. 261).

action.text: Amendment (A015) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
